SELECT user_follow.user_id, user_follow.each_other, user_follow.modified_time, user_info.nickname, user_info.gender, user_info.profile_photo, user_info.website, user_info.bio FROM user_follow, user_info WHERE user_follow.deleted = 0 AND user_info.deleted = 0 AND user_follow.follow = 1 AND user_follow.user_id = user_info.user_id AND user_follow.follow_id = #{userId} ORDER BY user_follow.modified_time DESC
